aeliusflavius2000 wrote:

> I understand that OISHI SHIKARA YOSHIKANE was the youngest of the
> famous 47 Ronin. I've also found references to him being 'spared'
> from the ritual suicide punishment passed on the other 46 members of
> his clan. Assuming this is all correct, does anyone know what
> happened to him? Did he die a natural death, in battle etc.
>

It's "Chikara". And he committed seppuku along with the rest of them, I'm
afraid. (Actually, including Chikara, there were 46.)

Tony
